title: Live updates: U.S. and Israel launch new strikes as Iran vows to avenge Khamenei
summary_full: President Donald Trump responded to a vow of revenge by Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps, promising to meet further retaliation with “a force that has never been seen before!”
summary_public: President Donald Trump responded to a vow of revenge by Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps, promising to meet further retaliation with “a force that has never been seen before!”

IL.label: negative
IL.evidence: U.S. and Israel launch new strikes
